definition: Whether the participant consumed any carrots, squash, or sweet potatoes that are yellow or orange inside yesterday. Qualitative dietary diversity was assessed on a monthly basis up to and including 8 months of age.
codebookDescription: 0/1; Condumption of carrots, squash, or sweet potatoes that are yellow or orange inside?. Source=MOA.

label: Target month for diet diversity survey
definition: Qualitative dietary diversity was assessed on a monthly basis up to and including 8 months of age.
codebookDescription: Target/scheduled month. Source=FRQ/FSQ/BRF/UCF/SRF/FSE/MOA.

label: Vitamin A fruits or vegetables
definition: Whether the participant consumed any vitamin A vegetable or fruit food groups (includes yellow fruit, spinach, yellow vegetables) yesterday. Qualitative dietary diversity was assessed on a monthly basis up to and including 8 months of age.
codebookDescription: 0/1; Consumption of vitamin A vegetables and fruits food group (includes yellow fruit, spinach, yellow vegetables). Source=calculated.

label: Different food groups consumed
definition: Sum of food groups consumed yesterday, based on WHO diet diversity for all children. Values ranged from 0-7. The 7 foods groups used for tabulation of this indicator were: (a) grains, roots and tubers; (b) legumes and nuts; (c) dairy products (milk, yogurt, cheese); (d) flesh foods (meat, fish, poultry and liver/organ meats); (e) eggs; (f) vitamin-A rich fruits and vegetables; (g) other fruits and vegetables. Qualitative dietary diversity was assessed on a monthly basis up to and including 8 months of age.
codebookDescription: 0-7  = Sum of food groups consumed based on WHO diet diversity for all children. The 7 foods groups used for tabulation of this indicator are:  grains, roots and tubers; legumes and nuts; dairy products (milk, yogurt, cheese); flesh foods (meat, fish, poultry and liver/organ meats); eggs; vitamin-A rich fruits and vegetables; other fruits and vegetables. Source=calculated.

label: Qualitative dietary intake questionnaire conducted in target window
definition: Whether the qualitative dietary diversity questionnaire was collected within a +/- 2 day target window or within a 7 day extended window. Qualitative dietary diversity was assessed on a monthly basis up to and including 8 months of age.
codebookDescription: Assessment is conducted in target window, extened window, out of window. Source=FRQ. out of window = 0, in target window = 1, in extended window = 2

label: Birth weight (kg)
definition: Weight at birth in kg.

label: Country
codebookDescription: Country. calculated
codebookValues: BG, BR, IN, NP, PE, PK, SA, TZ

label: Birth date
codebookDescription: Date of birth. CAF

label: Sex
codebookDescription: M=1, F=2. CAF

label: Length- or height-for-age z-score
definition: Length-for-age or height-for-age z-score, as appropriate by age. Length used when younger than 24m, height used when older than 24m. Anthropometry was assessed on a monthly basis up to and including 36m of age, and subsequently every 3 months up to and including 60m of age.
codebookDescription: Length-for-age z-score or Height-for-age Z-score, as appropriate by age (length<2y, height>2y). calculated

label: Head circumference (cm)
definition: Head circumference in cm. Anthropometry was assessed on a monthly basis up to and including 36m of age, and subsequently every 3 months up to and including 60m of age.
codebookDescription: Head circumference in cm. CAF/MOA/MOB/MOC

label: Height (cm)
definition: Height in cm, measured in participants 24m and older. Anthropometry was assessed on a monthly basis up to and including 36m of age, and subsequently every 3 months up to and including 60m of age.
codebookDescription: Height in cm (after 2y). MOC/AVF

label: Recumbent length (cm)
definition: Length in cm. Anthropometry was assessed on a monthly basis up to and including 36m of age, and subsequently every 3 months up to and including 60m of age.
codebookDescription: Length in cm. CAF/MOA/MOB

label: Recumbent length or height used for stature
definition: Indicates whether length or height was used for 'Stature.' Anthropometry was assessed on a monthly basis up to and including 36m of age, and subsequently every 3 months up to and including 60m of age.
codebookDescription: Indicates whether length or height was measured for Stature variable (Length=0, Height=1). calculated

label: Stature (cm)
definition: Length in cm. When length is not available, height in cm. Anthropometry was assessed on a monthly basis up to and including 36m of age, and subsequently every 3 months up to and including 60m of age.
codebookDescription: Length from MOA, MOB, MOC; When length is not available on MOC, height is used here. Height from AVF.. CAF/MOA/MOB/MOC/AVF

label: Urban or rural site
codebookDescription: Is the study site urban or rural?
codebookValues: BG, BR, IN, NP, PE, PK, SA, TZ

label: Weight (kg)
definition: Weight in kg. Anthropometry was assessed on a monthly basis up to and including 36m of age, and subsequently every 3 months up to and including 60m of age.
codebookDescription: Weight in kg. CAF/MOA/MOB/MOC/AVF

label: Weight-for-length or -height z-score
definition: Weight-for-length or weight-for-height z-score, as appropriate by age. Length used when younger than 24m, height used when older than 24m. Anthropometry was assessed on a monthly basis up to and including 36m of age, and subsequently every 3 months up to and including 60m of age.
codebookDescription: Weight-for-length Z-score or Weight-for-height Z-score, as appropriate by age (length<2y, height>2y). calculated

label: Anthropometry assessed in target window
definition: Whether anthropometry was assessed within a +/- 2 day target window or within a 7 day extended window. Anthropometry was assessed on a monthly basis up to and including 36m of age, and subsequently every 3 months up to and including 60m of age.
codebookDescription: 0 - out of window, 1 - in target window, 2 - in extended window. calculated

label: BMI-for-age z-score
definition: Body Mass Index (BMI)-for-age z-score, measured in participants 24m and older. Anthropometry was assessed on a monthly basis up to and including 36m of age, and subsequently every 3 months up to and including 60m of age.
codebookDescription: Body Mass Index (BMI)-for-age Z-score for children 2+ years old. calculated

label: Head circumference-for-age z-score
definition: Head circumference z-score. Anthropometry was assessed on a monthly basis up to and including 36m of age, and subsequently every 3 months up to and including 60m of age.
codebookDescription: Head circumference Z-score. calculated

label: Height-for-age z-score
definition: Height-for-age z-score. Anthropometry was assessed on a monthly basis up to and including 36m of age, and subsequently every 3 months up to and including 60m of age.
codebookDescription: Height-for-age Z-score (height from MOC/AVF). calculated

label: Length-for-age z-score
definition: Length-for-age z-score. Anthropometry was assessed on a monthly basis up to and including 36m of age, and subsequently every 3 months up to and including 60m of age.
codebookDescription: Length-for-age Z-score. calculated

label: Weight-for-age z-score
definition: Weight-for-age z-score. Anthropometry was assessed on a monthly basis up to and including 36m of age, and subsequently every 3 months up to and including 60m of age.
codebookDescription: Weight-for-age Z-score. calculated

label: Weight-for-height z-score
definition: Weight-for-height z-score. Anthropometry was assessed on a monthly basis up to and including 36m of age, and subsequently every 3 months up to and including 60m of age.
codebookDescription: Weight-for-height Z-score (height from MOC/AVF). calculated

label: Weight-for-length z-score
definition: Weight-for-length z-score. Anthropometry was assessed on a monthly basis up to and including 36m of age, and subsequently every 3 months up to and including 60m of age.
codebookDescription: Weight-for-length Z-score. calculated

label: Bacteria in stool
definition: Detection of the following bacteria in stool samples. Work up for detection of enteric pathogens was performed on diarrheal stool samples collected until 24 months of age (with a possible extension to 36 months of age) and first monthly asymptomatic stool samples collected at 1-12, 15, 18, 21, and 24 months of age (with the option to test additional monthly stool samples to 36 months of age).
codebookDescription: NA

label: Virus in stool
definition: Detection of the following viruses in stool samples. Work up for detection of enteric pathogens was performed on diarrheal stool samples collected until 24 months of age (with a possible extension to 36 months of age) and first monthly asymptomatic stool samples collected at 1-12, 15, 18, 21, and 24 months of age (with the option to test additional monthly stool samples to 36 months of age).
codebookDescription: NA
